about.title: Hi there, dearest!
about.description: My name is Maryna Kambur. I'm the designer and owner of the brand mariam crochet jewelry and an artist from Kyiv, Ukraine.
about.collections_description: For more inspiration and examples of my works, I invite you to explore the collections. I would be honored to create something beautiful and unique just for you.
about.shop_description: Thank you for stopping by my online corner. Feel free to check out the handmade jewelry and clothing pieces that are ready and waiting for buying.

collections.header: The collections feature examples of works, inspiration, and ideas for custom product orders

shop.header: In the shop all clothing and jewelry pieces are in stock and available for purchase

checkout_page.title: Checkout
checkout_page.other_messenger: Other (add in section for commets below)

confirmation_page.paragraph_one: I'll reach out to you as soon as possible. An email with order details has been sent to email address you provided.
confirmation_page.paragraph_two: Meanwhile I invite you to check my Instagram and Facebook page.

footer.info: mariam crochet jewelry is a Ukrainian clothing and crocheted jewelry brand founded by designer Maryna Kambur. Handcrafted lovingly in Kyiv, Ukraine.
